title: Single Justice Procedure cases - Press view (Full list)
header: Single Justice Procedure cases - Press view (Full list)
whatIsSJP: What are Single Justice Procedure cases?
sjpDescription: Cases ready to be decided by a magistrate without a hearing. Includes TV licensing and minor traffic offences such as speeding.
name: Name
importantInformationPart1: In accordance with the media protocol, additional documents from these cases are available to the members of the media on request. The link below takes you to the full protocol and further information in relation to what documentation can be obtained
importantInformationPart2: Protocol on sharing court lists, registers and documents with the media
